meanings.definition: Having a tendency to gulp quickly or eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The thirsty dog was gulpier than the others at the park.
meanings.sent2: She became gulpier when presented with her favorite drink.
meanings.sent3: The gulpier squirrel quickly finished all the nuts in the feeder.
meanings.sent4: His gulpier appetite made him finish his meal in record time.
meanings.sent5: The gulpier child eagerly drank the entire glass of milk in one go.

meanings.sent1: After taking a gulpier of water, he felt refreshed.
meanings.sent2: She poured herself a gulpier of juice to quench her thirst.
meanings.sent3: The gulpier of coffee he took before the meeting left him jittery.
meanings.sent4: His gulpier of knowledge from the book helped him ace the test.
meanings.sent5: The gulpier of air he inhaled filled his lungs with freshness.
